name: Carte Blanche: For a Fistful of Teeth...
name_original: Carte Blanche: For a Fistful of Teeth...
description:
Carte Blanche: For a Fistful of Teeth... is an adventure game developed by Absurdus. It came out on 24-11-2006. It was published by G2 Games.
Carte Blanche: For a Fistful of Teeth... is available on PC.
